title: Actions to enforce covenants not to compete
context: [ยง607-14.9] Actions to enforce covenants not to compete. In a civil action which involves the interpretation or enforcement of an agreement or alleged agreement which purportedly restricts an employee from competing with an employer, or former employer, or working for a competitor of an employer or former employer, any employee or former employee who prevails shall be awarded reasonable attorneys&rsquo; fees and costs. [L 1992, c 56, ยง1]
